data.eml:eml: Description of Penia mantillerii sp. nov. (Coleoptera: Elateridae: Dimini), with a key to Penia species from Vietnam and nearby areas

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kundrata, Robin, Németh, Tamás (2019): Description of Penia mantillerii sp. nov. (Coleoptera: Elateridae: Dimini), with a key to Penia species from Vietnam and nearby areas. Zootaxa 4612 (2): 275-281, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4612.2.10
